title: JINx SKIN WHERE?
body: JINx SKIN WHERE?, I really want her to get her next skin already :c {{champion:222}}

replies.body: Awaiting a new Vel Koz skin.

She's like "{{champion:222}} You don't say?"

And {{champion:236}} is like "Rest in peace."

An - and {{champion:157}} is like "Even though I came after Jinx I HASASKIN!!!"

An - an - and {{champion:107}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:121}} are all like "Yer imagine waiting 2 years for a skin (=A= ") "

Then {{champion:82}}  sits in the corner and like "Once upon a time I was cherished, and loved. When I could HueHueHue all day with the maces and metal shards flying around me. Maybe they should make a Junkyard skin for me like {{champion:48}}  because we really look alike, oh wait he gets a VU AND a new skin before me even though he came later. Oh once upon a time, I hue'ed."

{{champion:17}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:55}} all laugh, "u {{item:3070}} bro?"

{{champion:106}} {{champion:48}}  "Police! Police!! Run you fools I will catch ya!!!"
